price: 41. Y cuando los brujos llegaron, preguntaron al Faraón: “¿Recibiremos alguna recompensa si somos nosotros los vencedores?”.
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ قَالُواْ لِفِرۡعَوۡنَ أَئِنَّ لَنَا لَأَجۡرًا إِن كُنَّا نَحۡنُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: falammā jāa al-saḥaratu qālū lifir'ʿawna a-inna lanā la-ajran in kunnā naḥnu al-ghālibīna
